descriptionHtml:
[center][b][font=Courier New]
[/font][/b][b][font=Courier New][size=6]Required Mods[/size][/font][/b][b][font=Courier New]
[size=4]
[/size][/font][/b][b][font=Courier New][size=4]Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for ENB[/size][/font][/b][b][font=Courier New]
[/font][/b][b][font=Courier New][size=4]Enhanced Lighting for ENB (ELE) - LITE[/size][/font][/b][b][font=Courier New]
[/font][/b][b][font=Courier New][size=4]Enhanced Lights and FX [/size][/font][/b][b][font=Courier New]

[size=6]
Recommended Mods[/size]

[size=4]Skyrim High Definition LODs - Dark LOD Textures
Realistic Water Two 
Watercolor For ENB
High Quality LODs
Sun and clouds textures
Grimm's mountain retexture
Skyrim Flora overhaul
Unique Grasses and Groundcovers

[/size]
[size=6]Installation[/size]
[size=4]
Download [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0308.htm]ENB[/url] and drop d3d9 and enbhost to skyrim directory.
Download Real Light ENB and drop all files to skyrim directory
[/size][list]
[/list][size=4]Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/?]NLA 2.0[/url]
[/size][list]
[/list][size=4]Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]ELFX[/url]
[/size][list]
[/list][size=4]Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59733/?]ELE[/url][/size]
[/font][/b][b][font=Courier New][size=6]
My INI Settings[/size]

[size=4]uGridsToLoad=7
fLightLODMaxStartFade=15000.0
fShadowLODMaxStartFade=1000.0
iShadowMapResolution=1024
bFXAAEnabled=1
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=4
fInteriorShadowDistance=4000.0000
fShadowDistance=15000.0000
fShadowBiasScale=1.0000
b30GrassVS=1
fGrassStartFadeDistance=25000.0000
fGrassMaxStartFadeDistance=25000.0000
fGrassMinStartFadeDistance=10000.0000
[/size][/font][/b][/center]
